title: In pictures: Simone Biles
text:
Laurence Griffiths/Getty Images Simone Biles competes in the floor exercise during the World Championships in Stuttgart, Germany, on Thursday, October 10. In pictures: Simone Biles

Laurence Griffiths/Getty Images Simone Biles competes in the floor exercise during the World Championships in Stuttgart, Germany, on Thursday, October 10.

Simone Biles became the most decorated female gymnast in history after she took home her 22nd World Championship medal in October 2019. Sixteen of those medals are gold.

The 22-year-old American, who has been competing since 2010, also won four gold medals at the 2016 Olympics, including the individual all-around.
